column1: quest10-Capture-Capture the Thief Boss-This Gunnar the Red-Helm is a pain in our heads and pockets now. He is the biggest thief boss around here and he escaped from the city and now lives in the meadows. We sent two patrols to deal with him
column2: but he managed to escape each time. Please find him and bring him to justice. -Capture the Thief Boss-Oh
column3: thank you for bringing this murderer thief! He will soon realize the justice with his hands cut for stealing and head chopped off for killing. Here is your reward:-Tie him well. -Gunnar the Red
